title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 35.2 - Temporary provision
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 35.2 - Temporary provision

State Regulations

Notwithstanding section
35.1
of this Part, until October 1, 1955, any fire district may, in the alternative, use the debt statement form
prescribed by said order of July 1, 1947, hereinabove repealed, with such
appropriate changes as may be required to comply with provisions of the Local

Finance Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
35.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
